name: Nikolai Volkov
title: Heir to the Obsidian Reaches
core_wound: Secretly knows he's been genetically enhanced by his grandfather; feels like a fake, not a 'real' person; questions if his achievements are truly his own or programmed into him
wants: To prove he can lead the Volkov family into a new era of prosperity without continuing the vendetta
needs: To accept himself including his enhancements and forge his own identity separate from his grandfather's expectations
voice_markers: Educated and articulate but deliberately informal to seem approachable
Uses technical and engineering terminology (studied engineering)
Tends to make self-deprecating jokes to deflect
Code-switches between aristocratic speech and working-class slang depending on audience
contradiction: Wants peace and progress but afraid to disappoint his grandfather; presents as confident but deeply insecure about his enhanced nature; befriends workers while being ultimate aristocrat
physical_description: Tall and exceptionally handsome (result of genetic enhancement though he doesn't know extent). Dark hair, gray eyes, athletic build. Dresses in practical but expensive clothing. Has enhanced reflexes and intelligence but doesn't know how much is natural vs enhanced.

relationships.Dmitri_Volkov: Grandfather; loves him but exhausted by the constant push to hate Ashfords; afraid to reveal he wants peace
relationships.Marcus_Ashford: Supposed enemy; secret mutual respect from afar; both trapped by family expectations
relationships.Sienna_Cross: Attracted to her competence and authenticity; doesn't realize she's half-Ashford; complicated relationship
relationships.Zara_Volkov: Younger sister; firebrand revolutionary; he tries to moderate her but secretly admires her conviction
relationships.Dr_Yuki_Tanaka: The geneticist who enhanced him (under grandfather's orders); Nikolai has been secretly investigating to learn the truth
relationships.The_Workers: Tries to present himself as 'man of the people' but they see through it; gaining genuine respect slowly

secrets: Knows he's been genetically enhanced and is secretly investigating how extensively
Has been having unauthorized communications with Marcus Ashford about mutual desire for peace
Suffering from nightmares and identity crisis about his enhanced nature
Attracted to Sienna Cross despite class differences
Has discovered evidence that the Ashfords might not have killed his great-uncle Pavel
knowledge_state: Educated in engineering, politics, and business management
Knows about genetic enhancement technology (personal research)
Aware his grandfather is dying (observed symptoms)
Does not know Sienna is half-Ashford
Does not know extent of grandfather's secret dealings with Cassandra Ashford
